info.description: Permanently removes multiple bookings from the system in a single operation. This is useful for bulk cleanup operations. The endpoint returns detailed results about which deletions succeeded and which failed.
info.title: Booking API

delete.description: Permanently removes multiple bookings from the system in a single operation. This is useful for bulk cleanup operations. The endpoint returns detailed results about which deletions succeeded and which failed.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of booking IDs to delete
parameters.name: ids

get.description: Get all the booking resources with optional filtering by customer, employee, booking state, date range, and team

parameters.description: Filter by multiple team IDs (comma separated)
parameters.name: teamIds

post.description: Create a single booking resource with customer details, appointment time, services, and payment information

requestBody.description: JSON body to create a booking resource

post.description: Create a single event for many booking resources, useful for batch operations like marking multiple bookings as paid or approved

requestBody.description: JSON body to create an event for many booking resources

post.summary: Create a single event for many booking resources

get.description: Get all the booking resources metadata including total count and pagination information

parameters.description: Filter by multiple team IDs (comma separated)
parameters.name: teamIds

post.description: Create many booking resources at once for recurring appointments, specifying multiple dates for the same booking details

requestBody.description: JSON body to create a booking resource

get.description: Get all the bookings' report data points for analytics and reporting purposes, with optional filtering by customer, employee, booking state, date range, and team

parameters.description: Filter by multiple team IDs (comma separated)
parameters.name: teamIds

get.summary: Get all bookings' report data points

get.description: Search all the booking resources using a text query that matches against booking details, customer information, and other relevant fields

delete.description: Permanently removes a booking from the system. This action cannot be undone and should be used with caution. All associated data including messages, orders, and payment information will be deleted.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

get.description: Retrieves a specific booking by its ID with all associated details including customer information, pet details, service information, and booking status

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

patch.description: Updates a booking's details including customer information, pet details, service information, and booking status. This endpoint allows for partial updates of booking information.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

requestBody.description: JSON body to update a booking

patch.description: Updates or applies a voucher to a booking, which can affect pricing and discounts. This endpoint handles validation of voucher codes and application of appropriate discounts.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

requestBody.description: JSON body to change a booking's voucher

post.description: Adds a new message or note to a booking. This can be used for internal staff communication or customer-facing notes about special requirements or instructions.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

requestBody.description: JSON body containing the message to add

delete.description: Deletes an existing message or note from a booking. This permanently removes the message from the booking history.

parameters.description: ID of the message to remove
parameters.name: messageId

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

patch.description: Updates an existing message or note attached to a booking. This allows for correction or clarification of previously added information.

parameters.description: ID of the message to change
parameters.name: messageId

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

requestBody.description: JSON body containing the updated message

put.description: Move a single booking resource from one team to another, transferring all associated data and maintaining relationships

requestBody.description: JSON body to move a booking resource

patch.description: Updates the service orders associated with a booking. This can include adding, removing, or modifying services that are part of the booking, which may affect pricing and scheduling.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

requestBody.description: JSON body containing the updated orders

patch.description: Reschedules a booking to a new date and time. This endpoint automatically marks the booking as rescheduled and updates all relevant timestamps and status information.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

requestBody.description: JSON body to reschedule a booking

patch.description: Updates the transportation mode for a booking, which can affect pricing and logistics. This is particularly important for services that include pet pickup or delivery.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

requestBody.description: JSON body to change transport mode of a booking

patch.summary: Change transport mode for a booking

patch.description: Removes the association between a booking and its Xero invoice. This is useful when an invoice needs to be regenerated or when correcting integration issues with the accounting system.

parameters.description: Type of application making the request
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type
